skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I possess a proficient command over a diverse array of tools essential for creating captivating and dynamic Front-End websites. My expertise spans ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, Redux, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, among others.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: In managing the backend or server side of websites, I employ tools such as NodeJS, ExpressJS, Restful APIs, and utilize fetch to ensure seamless functionality and smooth operation of the website.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: As a MERN Stack developer, I primarily utilize MongoDB for storing website data. Nonetheless, I have hands-on experience with Firebase and am progressively gaining proficiency in SQL databases like Postgres.

portfolio.title: Real Estate Website
portfolio.description: The full-stack real estate website was constructed using React and Tailwind for the frontend, and for the backend, NodeJS, ExpressJS, JWT, Firebase, among others, were employed, with MongoDB serving as the data storage solution

portfolio.title: Ecommerce Website
portfolio.description: Here's a glimpse of the frontend for a straightforward eCommerce website built using ReactJS, Redux for state management, and CSS3 for styling purposes.

portfolio.title: Static Website
portfolio.description: The design of this website is truly striking, showcasing a remarkable build achieved solely with HTML5 and Bootstrap. Its aesthetic appeal and functionality speak volumes about the exclusive use of these tools.

testimonial.title: Ahuse
testimonial.description: My name is Olusola Jaiyeola, I'm a Full Stack Developer. I build beautiful and responsive websiites with web applications using the latest technologies.
